Author: karentakethekids
Text: i cant say anythung about b/p but i can definetely give u a small motivational post. I am v happy you want to recover. The earlier u get better the earlier u will b able to enjoy life and be happy. Also if u start recovering when u are 14 u have a lot of chance to undo the stuff that happened to ur body.  Sending u all the love and support

Author: probwatchingcritrole
Text: Well, you could find a weight that's "healthy" for you with a BMI calculator but it might be better if you shifted your focus away from your weight and instead focused on eating to full satiety.  As for b/ping, the one thing that helped me for a while was telling myself that purging was NOT an option, no matter how bad the binge was. Ngl, the urge is going to be there, but you don't have to act on it. Do your best to d√≠stract yourself after meals (reading, video games...) and eventually the urge will pass
